ModMetaData.name: Medieval Overlap Remover
ModMetaData.author: JoeOwnage
ModMetaData.description: This mod uses ReplaceLib (thanks Fernie!) to get rid of the overlap between Medieval Overhaul and Vanilla Factions Expanded: Medieval 2. - Added compatibility patch for Medieval Overhaul + VFE Medieval 2. De-duplication of Apiary, Honey, Mead, Grapes, Must, Wine, Castle Wall, Hearth, Fur Beds, Bellows linkable, Palisade Walls. Hides VFEM2 Wine Barrel, Draught Labs (recipes moved to Alchemy Table), Linkable Anvil.
